meanings.sent1: The bandagers at the hospital are skilled at wrapping injuries.
meanings.sent2: We need more bandagers to help with first aid at the event.
meanings.sent3: The bandagers at the clinic had a race to see who could wrap a bandage the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was like a bandager, carefully tending to the wounded with expertise.
meanings.sent5: The bandagers worked tirelessly, ensuring every patient was properly cared for.

meanings.sent1: The team of bandagers arrived at the scene to assist the injured.
meanings.sent2: The bandagers gathered all the supplies needed to treat the wounded.
meanings.sent3: The bandagers formed a bandage-wrapping assembly line for efficiency.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the bandagers looked like a group of angels tending to the hurt.
meanings.sent5: The bandagers' dedication to their work was truly admirable.
